text: Donald Reche Caldwell Jr. ( or ; March 28, 1979 â€“ June 6, 2020) was an American professional football player. He was born in Tampa, Florida. Caldwell was a wide receiver in the National Football League (NFL) for six seasons in the 2000s. Caldwell played college football for the Florida Gators. He played professionally for the San Diego Chargers, New England Patriots and Washington Redskins of the NFL. Caldwell was shot and killed during a robbery in Tampa on June 6, 2020 at the age of 41. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football wide receivers Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:New England Patriots players Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Sportspeople from Tampa, Florida Category:St. Louis Rams players Category:Washington Redskins players
title: Reche Caldwell
